channel.title: crd-to-yaml on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in crd-to-yaml on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: crd-to-yaml now supports HTML as an output format
item.description: Hello! Just wanted to give an update to my crd-to-sample-yaml tool. It, now, supports creating a standalone HTML output. Why, you may ask? Well, now you can host the generated content as a static page on your website. That’s pretty handy. Here is a sample output: Go and get it while it’s hot in version v0.4.0. That’s all. Thanks for reading!
